meta.title: MCP Probe Kit - AI-Powered Complete Development Toolkit | 21 Tools Covering Entire Development Lifecycle
meta.description: MCP Probe Kit provides 21 AI-powered development tools covering requirements analysis, code development, quality assurance, bug fixing, and release management. Supports Cursor, Cline, Claude Desktop with 100% structured output.
meta.keywords: MCP Probe Kit, AI development tools, code generation, code review, Git tools, UI development, development efficiency, Cursor, Cline, Claude, MCP Server

cursor.title: Cursor / Cline
cursor.description: Create or edit in project root directory
cursor.tipText: Cursor and Cline use project-level configuration, each project can have independent MCP server configuration.

step3.title: Verify Installation
step3.description: After completing configuration, verify with the following steps:
step3.step1: Restart MCP client (Cursor / Cline / Claude Desktop)
step3.step2Command: Please use gencommit tool to generate a test commit message
step3.step3: If it returns a commit message following Conventional Commits specification, installation is successful!
step3.issue1: "Tool not found" â†’ Check configuration file format
step3.issue2: "Command not found" â†’ Confirm Node.js is installed
step3.issue3: Windows users â†’ Ensure using npx method

step4.title: Delegated Orchestration Protocol
step4.description: orchestration tools do not execute operations directly, but return an executable plan.
step4.tipText3: files are actually written to disk

q1.title: Issue 1: Module resolution error caused by npx cache

q2.title: Issue 2: MCP server connection failed
q2.step2: If below v16, please upgrade Node.js
q2.step4: Check if configuration file JSON format is correct

migration.title: v3.0 Migration Guide
migration.subtitle: Smoothly migrate from v2.x to v3.0, understand breaking changes and new features

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: MCP Probe Kit v3.0 is a major version update, streamlined to 20 core tools, bringing more powerful features and better development experience.
overview.migrationTimeText: Most projects can complete migration in 10-15 minutes, v2.x core tools remain compatible in v3.0.

toolsOptimization.title: 1. Tools Streamlining
toolsOptimization.description: v2.x: 39 tools â†’ v3.0: 20 core tools (removed low-frequency tools, kept high-value tools)

workflows.title: 2. New Workflow Orchestration
workflows.description2: workflow orchestration tools, providing end-to-end automated development process:

structuredOutput.title: 4. Structured Output Upgrade
structuredOutput.description: Core and orchestration tools prioritize structured output, consistent and predictable output format, facilitating tool chaining and state tracking.

step1.title: Step 1: Update Version
step1.npxDesc: # No action needed, automatically uses latest version

step2.title: Step 2: Check Configuration File
step2.description: v3.0 configuration file format is fully compatible with v2.x, no modification needed.
step2.compatibleText: v2.x core tools remain compatible in v3.0, seamless upgrade possible.
